page.title: 04FARMING 2-TREATON FARM,STAR
page.content: { {CROPS}- We grow spring barley,winter barley and wheat. The barley goes to the grain dryer and goes into the bins. Then a lorry comes to collect it, the barley comes out of bins into the lorry. We had an old house and some men came to build a new one. While it was being built, my mum, dad and Kevin stayed at{Pyeston Farm.}We have bulls, cows, bullocks and heifers. We grow spring green cabbage, savoy cabbage, sprouts, turnips and cauliflower. My dad's name is William Black and he is 41 years old. My mum's name is Margaret Cairns Black and she is 39. My brother's name is Kevin and he is 13. My name is Neil and I am 9 years old. We got our bulls from the Perth show and at the{Perth and {Stirling}markets. Our cows came from Perth & Stirling markets.
